metadata.keywords: react, nextjs, front-end developer, portfolio, web development, AI, artificial intelligence

hero.title: Welcome to the World of
hero.subtitle: Where feline passion meets impeccable code. Transforming ideas into digital solutions, one meow-code at a time.
hero.catMessage: Purrrr! I'm Axel, the CatBytes mascot! üêæ

about.title: The Developer's Den
about.intro: Hello! I'm Izadora Pierette, a Full Stack Developer passionate about creating innovative and efficient digital solutions. My journey in the programming world began with the curiosity to uncover how things work behind the screens, and since then, I've been dedicated to transforming complex ideas into intuitive and functional interfaces.
about.description: With a focus on HTML, advanced CSS, and JavaScript, I always seek the best clean code practices to deliver high-quality projects. I believe that, just like a perceptive cat, technology requires attention to detail, agility, and a touch of creativity to solve the most intriguing challenges.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: My skills are classified into "Meow Levels," a fun analogy to proficiency in the feline and programming world.

levels.title: Meow Levels: Understand My Proficiency
levels.intro: To make the evaluation of my skills more fun and thematic, I used "Meow Levels" as a way to indicate my proficiency in each area. The percentage values demonstrate an estimate of time I've spent developing each skill over 4 years:
levels.beginner: Fundamental knowledge, capable of performing simple tasks and learning quickly, learning level between 1%-40%
levels.intermediate: Good understanding and ability to apply concepts in more complex projects, with some autonomy, learning level between 41%-70%.
levels.advanced: Solid experience, capable of solving challenging problems and optimizing solutions, learning level between 71%-99%.
levels.expert: Expertise in the area, able to lead projects, innovate and act as a reference, 100% learning level.
levels.conclusion: Just as a cat learns and refines its hunting and socialization skills, I constantly seek to evolve in the development world!

projects.title: The Project Hunt
projects.subtitle: Projects that demonstrate technical expertise and innovative solutions

meowflix.title: MeowFlix AI
meowflix.description: Movie recommendation system with AI that analyzes user mood through natural language (Google Gemini) and suggests personalized films using real TMDB data. Accessible and responsive interface with netflix-inspired theme.

catbutler.title: CATButler - AI Home Assistant
catbutler.description: Responsive SPA Dashboard-style that transforms domestic routines with AI, helping organize tasks, plan meals and shop intelligently in a sustainable way. Combines modern interface, gamification and personalized recommendations.

chatbot.title: Via Lactea Chat-Bot
chatbot.description: Front-end application that simulates a chatbot with dynamic personality and contextual responses. Incorporates interactive visual effects, smooth animations and responsive design with advanced DOM manipulation and modular logic.

agent.title: WhatsApp AI Agent
agent.description: Automated WhatsApp service system with multiple AI agents. Performs lead qualification, appointment scheduling and confirmation. Features conversational memory (PostgreSQL), multimodal processing (audio, image and text) and automatic reminder sending.

medical.title: Medical Institutional Website - Complete Management Platform
medical.description: Web system for clinics and offices with n8n backend and integrated AI. Includes intelligent chat with OpenAI based on scientific sources, scheduling with automatic weekend and holiday blocking, insurance management and real-time validation.

catbytes1.title: CatBytes 1.0 - Original Portfolio
catbytes1.description: First version of the CatBytes personal portfolio, developed with fundamental web technologies. A project that marked the beginning of the development journey, featuring responsive design, smooth animations, and a feline-themed interface that captures the essence of the CatBytes brand.

curiosities.title: The Cat Beyond the Keyboard
curiosities.paragraph1: Three years ago, my life changed in a way I never expected. I found a tiny one-month-old kitten, alone and soaked by the rain in front of my house. I had no plans to adopt a pet, but that tiny, helpless gaze convinced me. He became Axel, and since then, it's been a journey of love, learning, and of course, some feline challenges.
curiosities.paragraph2: Raising Axel taught me a lot about patience and resilience. I remember the days when he, as a kitten, scratched everything and everyone with his sharp little claws ‚Äì a real test for my calm! But with time and dedication, he became the most affectionate and playful companion I could wish for.
curiosities.paragraph3: This experience made me reflect on my own journey as a developer. Just as it's difficult to learn a new programming language, face bugs, or master a new tool, raising a cat also requires persistence and adaptation. There are moments of frustration, but the reward of seeing a project working or Axel purring on my lap is priceless. Each challenge pushed me to learn and grow, transforming obstacles into new skills, both in life and in code.
curiosities.imageAxelKitten: Photo of Axel as a kitten
curiosities.imageAxelAdult: Photo of Axel as an adult

adoptCat.title: Adopt a Kitten
adoptCat.description: Provide the age, fur color, and your location so our AI can search for cat adoption ads near you.
adoptCat.note: This feature uses Netlify Functions, SerpApi, and Gemini API. A real database of ads is being compiled. More accurate searches will be available in the future!
adoptCat.scoreInfo: AI Score: each ad receives a score from 1 to 10, indicating reliability according to signals evaluated by the AI.

identifyCat.title: Kitten Identifier
identifyCat.description: Upload a photo of the kitten and our AI will try to identify its approximate age, breed, and personality traits.
identifyCat.note: We process your photo via Netlify Function (Gemini model). Formats: JPG/PNG/WEBP. Ideal size: 1-2 MB, maximum 8 MB. The image is processed temporarily and is not stored.
identifyCat.privacy: Results are estimates and do not replace veterinary diagnosis.

donateCat.title: Need to Donate a Kitten?
donateCat.description: Our AI can help create an attractive and informative ad to facilitate the responsible adoption of your kitten.
